name: Retro Headache Rampage
description:
---------------------------------------

CONTROLS:

WASD or LEFT/RIGHT/UP/DOWN -> move

SHIFT/SPACE -> Dash

P/ESC -> Pause

---------------------------------------

Welcome to Retro Headache Rampage!

Why doesn't matter, but the creeps are coming and need to be destroyed. But there are no weapons, there is only you and your head. bash them, slice them, cut them. and pay the ULTIMATE PRICE: your sanity.

---------------------------------------

CREDITS:

Music: "Theme Song" be "nene" - ( https://opengameart.org/content/theme-song-8-bit )

Font: "Fairlight" by "Freaky Font" - (https://www.urbanfonts.com/fonts/Fairlight.font)

Tools:

- SFX Creator: https://sfxr.me/ 

- Asesprite

- (of course) Godot game engine - ( https://godotengine.org/ )

have fun :)
